data.name: MobileAppsTitle
data.comment: Title of the mobile applications group page

data.name: MobileAppsModuleDescription
data.value: Create mobile apps based on Sitefinity modules (News, Blogs, Events, etc. or modules created with Module builder).
data.comment: Description of the mobile applications group page

data.name: MobileAppsModuleUrlName
data.comment: UrlName of the mobile applications group page

data.name: AllowCrud
data.value: Reading, creating, editing and deleting content
data.comment: phrase: Reading, creating, editing and deleting content

data.name: UserPermissionsControl
data.value: User permissions will control these operations
data.comment: phrase: User permissions will control these operations

data.name: RegularExpressionErrorMessage
data.value: App name contains invalid characters. Please use: letters, numbers, spaces and _.
data.comment: phrase: App name contains invalid characters. Please use: letters, numbers, spaces and _.

data.name: NameCannotBeEmpty
data.value: Mobile app name cannot be empty
data.comment: phrase: Mobile app name cannot be empty

data.name: SelectBasedOnModuleError
data.comment: phrase: Please select based on module

data.name: NoAppsCreatedYet
data.value: No apps have been created yet
data.comment: phrase: No apps have been created yet

data.name: CreateFirstMobileApp
data.comment: phrase: Create your first mobile app

data.name: BackToMobileAppBuilder
data.comment: phrase: Back to Mobile app builder

data.name: HowToGetAppOnMyPhone
data.value: How to get this app on my phone?
data.comment: phrase: How to get this app on my phone?

data.name: HowToGetAppOnMyPhoneDescr
data.value: If you want to use a module with the same fields and settings in other projects, you can import exported .zip file there.
data.comment: phrase: If you want to use a module with the same fields and settings in other projects, you can import exported .zip file there.

data.name: HowToUseAppsDescrLine1
data.value: You need to have Sitefinity Box installed on your phone in order to use all apps created here.
data.comment: phrase: Download the app from the respective marketplace for each platform, and run it.

data.name: HowToUseAppsDescrLine2
data.value: Download the Sitefinity Box app from the respective marketplace for each platform
data.comment: phrase: Once the application is up and running you will be prompted to enter the app key of your Everlive app and you are done!

data.name: HowToUseAppsDescrLine3
data.value: Once the Sitefinity Box is installed, login with your account you use in this site
data.comment: phrase: Now you can sign up, start taking pictures, and sharing moments that will be automatically uploaded to cloud.

data.name: HowToUseAppsDescrLine4
data.value: All apps created here will be automatically available in your Sitefinity Box
data.comment: phrase: You can easily manage the generated content of your app in the Everlive Portal or push content to the device by creating it in the Portal itself.

data.name: ConfirmMobileAppDeleteMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete {0} mobile application?
data.comment: phrase: Are you sure you want to delete {0} mobile application?

data.name: PublishInSitefinityBoxExample
data.value: To view this app in action without having to deploy it to an app store, use this option to push the app to Sitefinity Box, and start managing app content right away.
data.comment: phrase: To view this app in action without having to deploy it to an app store, use this option to push the app to Sitefinity Box, and start managing app content right away.

data.name: ModifyAppInIcenium
data.comment: phrase: Modify the app in AppBuilder

data.name: ModifyAppInIceniumExample
data.value: To modify your generated app in an Integrated Cloud Environment (ICE), select this option that will automatically push the application to AppBuilder.
data.comment: phrase: To modify your generated app in an Integrated Cloud Environment (ICE), select this option that will automatically push the application to AppBuilder.

data.name: DownloadAppAsZip
data.value: Download the app as ZIP file
data.comment: phrase: Download the app as ZIP file

data.name: DownloadAppAsZipExample
data.value: To modify your generated app in any development environment, use this option and start developing your app in your favourite IDE.
data.comment: phrase: To modify your generated app in any development environment, use this option and start developing your app in your favourite IDE.

data.name: PublishToSfBoxSuccessMessage
data.value: The app is succesfully published to Sitefinity Box
data.comment: word: The app is succesfully published to Sitefinity Box

data.name: PublishToSfBoxErrorMessage
data.value: There was error publishing the app to Sitefinity Box
data.comment: word: There was error publishing the app to Sitefinity Box

data.name: UploadedToIceniumSuccessMessage
data.value: The app is successfully uploaded to AppBuilder
data.comment: word: The app is successfully uploaded to AppBuilder

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhone
data.value: How to have this app on my phone?
data.comment: phrase: How to have this app on my phone?

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhoneDescriptionLine1
data.value: A. I have Sitefinity Box installed on my phone
data.comment: phrase: A. I have Sitefinity Box installed on my phone

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhoneDescriptionLine2
data.value: Just open the Sitefinity Box and this app will be automatically downloaded there
data.comment: phrase: Just open the Sitefinity Box and this app will be automatically downloaded there

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhoneDescriptionLine3
data.value: B. I don't have Sitefinity Box installed on my phone
data.comment: phrase: B. I don't have Sitefinity Box installed on my phone

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhoneDescriptionLine4
data.value: Download the Sitefinity Box app from the respective marketplace for each platform
data.comment: phrase: 1. Download the Sitefinity Box app from the respective marketplace for each platform

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhoneDescriptionLine5
data.value: Once the Sitefinity Box is installed, login with your account you use in this site
data.comment: phrase: 2. Once the Sitefinity Box is installed, login with your account you use in this site

data.name: HowToHaveAppOnMyPhoneDescriptionLine6
data.value: All apps created here will be automatically available in your Sitefinity Box
data.comment: phrase: 3. All apps created here will be automatically available in your Sitefinity Box

data.name: ScanThisCode
data.value: Scan this code to download Sitefinity Box
data.comment: phrase: Scan this code to download Sitefinity Box
